item.title: Deploying full fledged flask app in production
item.description: This article will focus on deploying flask app starting from scratch like creating separate linux user, installating database, web server. Web server will be nginx, database will be postgres, python 2.7 middleware will be uwsgi, server ubuntu 13.10 x64. Flask app name is fido. Demo is carried out in Digital ocean. Step 1 - Installation Python header root@fido:~# apt-get install -y build-essential python-dev Install uwsgi dependencies root@fido:~# apt-get install -y libxml2-dev libxslt1-dev Nginx, uwsgi
